document.full_text: a virus that causes respiratory disease in humans has been linked to the deaths of critically endangered mountain gorillas in east africa, a u.s. veterinary research group said wednesday.
document.title: human virus linked to mountain gorilla deaths
lines_and_colors: a virus that causes respiratory disease in humans has been linked to the deaths of critically endangered mountain gorillas in east africa, a u.s. veterinary research group said wednesday.
